protocol.name: P-10812-1
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 15 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450, protocol EukGE-WS2v4.

protocol.name: P-10812-2
protocol.text: Plants were grown on soil for 3 weeks under continuous light at 90 mmol. m-2 . s-1

protocol.name: P-10812-3
protocol.text: Plants were transferred to the dark for 8 h and rosette leaves were harvested 2 h after reillumination.

protocol.name: P-10812-4
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 ug total RNA (Eukaryotic Target Preparation, 2002, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-10812-5
protocol.text: total RNA extraction was performed according to the guanidine-hydrochloride method as described in Melzer, S., Majewski, D. M. & Apel, K. (1990) Plant Cell 2, 953-961.
